Title: Vice President of business technology
Headline: US Airways announces two new appointments to leadership team
What Happened: US Airways appointed Todd Christy as Vice President of business technology
About Person: Todd Christy was previously the Managing Director of Applications at USAirways.
About Company: US Airways; along with US Airways Shuttle and US Airways Express; operates more than 3;000 flights per day and serves nearly 200 communities in the U.S.; Canada; Europe; the Middle East; the Caribbean; South America and Latin America.
